content.en: Vaccine design revolution: Scientists have been using algorithms to aid in the design of vaccines against various diseases. These algorithms are used to evaluate different approaches for selecting peptides, predict epitopes, and identify potential vaccine targets. By combining bioinformatics, docking, and molecular dynamics simulations, researchers are able to design more effective and targeted vaccines. These computational tools are accelerating the design of novel and next-generation vaccines, including those against COVID-19.
content.da: Vaccine design revolution: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at hjælpe med design af vacciner mod forskellige sygdomme. Disse algoritmer bruges til at evaluere forskellige tilgange til udvælgelse af peptider, forudsige epitoper og identificere potentielle vaccinemål. Ved at kombinere bioinformatik, docking og molekylære dynamik-simuleringer er forskere i stand til at designe mere effektive og målrettede vacciner. Disse computerbaserede værktøjer fremskynder designet af nye og næste generations vacciner, inklusive dem mod COVID-19.
